children.children: Get Ready to Laugh: The Funniest Apples!

children.description: A fun tagline that adds flavor to the title.
children.children: Because an apple a day keeps the boredom away!

children.children: Why did the apple stop in the middle of the road?

children.description: The punchline of the first joke.
children.children: Because it ran out of juice!

children.description: Setup for another joke.
children.children: What do you call two apples next to each other?

children.description: Punchline for that joke.

First apple fact.
children.children: Did you know apples float because 25% of their volume is air?

children.description: Second apple fact.
children.children: There are more than 7,500 varieties of apples grown worldwide!
